text.div:
St. Louis Encephalitis Virus Infection (Tests for Saint Louis encephalitis virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    27950-5 Saint Louis encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Probe
    34458-0 Saint Louis encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    34459-8 Saint Louis encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    37984-2 Saint Louis encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    55145-7 Saint Louis encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    8025-9 Saint Louis encephalitis virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
